nodes.bodyText: Is there a limit to the length of an artifact name? :)

Nope :-) Well, until it fits in the memory of the JVM.
Note that it's internal only. No one except us is going to use this.
I'm not sure I would add a feature if it's a purely internal extension?

I agree it was more something for me to check that it was the right implementation.
Let me remove this.
